Uses of Server in com.cloudera.hoop
 

Subclasses of Server in com.cloudera.hoop
 class HoopServer
          Bootstrap class that manages the initialization and destruction of the Hoop server, it is a javax.servlet.ServletContextListener implementation that is wired in Hoop's WAR WEB-INF/web.xml.
